OOC: lol ---> Kruster =P

::Razorclaw::
He snarls as a rifle blast clips off a piece of his shoulder armour, 
and another singes his knee. Machine gun fire pelts the ground and 
deflects off of his armour. "What a waste of energy, shooting at 
me!" He growls, and slashes at Khonkolor with his sonic sword.

> OOC: See that Kruster is shooting RazorClaws too.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Khonkolor::
